aboutPage.aboutMeText: My name is Joana, I live in Portugal, and I graduated with a master’s degree in Physics Engineering from the Faculty of Sciences of the University of Lisbon. After my studies, I couldn’t find opportunities in the field, so I decided to pursue programming, which allowed me to complement my knowledge with technology. Each project has given me the chance to learn new tools, so I decided to apply some of my knowledge to create this online resume. Outside of work, I enjoy traveling (who doesn’t?), playing escape games, gardening, and testing new gadgets. Want to know more? Then reach out to me on LinkedIn.
aboutPage.introAbout: Hi, my name is Joana, and as you might have guessed, I love challenges. So, I’ve prepared a little quiz before sharing more about me. You can choose between solving a puzzle or answering a small math question. Have fun!

homePage.introP1: Hello and welcome to my web page!
homePage.introP2: I created this page with the purpose of sharing the projects I’ve been developing on GitHub, and I thought it should also be part of my portfolio.
homePage.introP3: This page was developed using Angular (Frontend Framework), and the code is available in my public GitHub repository:
homePage.introP4: Additionally, I used GitHub Pages to deploy it, so you can access it from anywhere without needing an IDE.
homePage.introP5: I invite you to explore the sections above to learn more about my work:

quotes.quote1: Technology is best when it brings people together. — Matt Mullenweg
quotes.quote2: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving. — Albert Einstein
quotes.quote3: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. — Eleanor Roosevelt
